text: 17|51|‘athaba ene kono srstita parainata horaa yito tomalokara antarata bara danara buli bhaba’; (tathapi'o tomalokaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’ba) iyara pichato sihamte ka’ba, ‘kone amaka punaraut'thita karaiba’? Koraa, ‘teraemi karaiba, yijane prathamabara tomalokaka srsti karaichila’. Tetiya sihamte mura jokarai sudhiba, ‘se'itono ketiya ha’ba? Koraa, ‘sambharata seya ati sighrae'i ha’ba’.
